com.company

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Token

  • public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single token in the game . It can have red or black color which is defined with unicode field. It has a location in the board which is specified with x and y ; and it also has a block number which means the number of block it is in .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Token(int x, int y, java.lang.String unicode, int block)
      Makes a new token with given x and y for its location , unicode string for color , and block number for specifying the block which the token is in .

    • Constructor Detail

      • Token

        public Token(int x,
             int y,
             java.lang.String unicode,
             int block)
        Makes a new token with given x and y for its location , unicode string for color , and block number for specifying the block which the token is in .
        Parameters:
        x - token's location x , it's a number from 0 to 5
        y - token's location y , it's a number from 0 to 5
        unicode - string which when printed , shows the color of token
        block - block number that the token is in
